doc:
Leslie Banks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_Banks 0 Leslie James Banks CBE (9 June 1890 – 21 April 1952) was an English stage and screen actor, director and producer, now best remembered for playing gruff, menacing characters in black-and-white films of the 1930s and 1940s. Leslie_James_Banks_CBE ( 9_June_1890 – 21_April_1952 ) was an_English_stage_and_screen_actor , director_and_producer , now best_remembered for playing gruff_,_menacing_characters in black-and-white_films of the_1930s_and_1940s .
